explains: v. 呈递，提交；屈服，不得已接受；建议，主张；使经受，使受到
wordGroup: submit registration 提交登记表；提交注册

sentences.en: Job applicants have to submit a specimen of handwriting.
sentences.cn: 求职者必须提交一份笔迹样本。

sentences.en: It is laid down that all candidates must submit three copies of their dissertation.
sentences.cn: 根据规定所有的学位答辩人均须提交论文一式三份。

sentences.en: They are inviting talented but unheralded movie-makers to submit examples of their work.
sentences.cn: 他们正邀请一些有才华但未得到肯定的导演提交他们的样片。
